mapper.select: SELECT * FROM passenger WHERE `name` LIKE #{name} limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
SELECT attributeDetailsName FROM listone LEFT JOIN listtwo ON listtwo.id=listone.`attributeID` WHERE listOne.`id`=#{xxx};

mapper.update:
update passenger
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
genderID = #{genderID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
genderName = #{genderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthDate = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE},
nationID = #{nationID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nationName = #{nationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
licenceIssuingAuthorty = #{licenceIssuingAuthorty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
papersValidity = #{papersValidity,jdbcType=DATE},
profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
educationDegreeID = #{educationDegreeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
educationDegreeName = #{educationDegreeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
passengerLevelID = #{passengerLevelID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
papersID = #{papersID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
papersName = #{papersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
papersNumber = #{papersNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unitsOrAddress = #{unitsOrAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thingReasonID = #{thingReasonID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thingReasonName = #{thingReasonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
whereAreFrom = #{whereAreFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
whereToGo = #{whereToGo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contactPhoneNumber = #{contactPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{del_flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update passenger set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, genderID = #{genderID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, genderName = #{genderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthDate = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, nationID = #{nationID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nationName = #{nationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licenceIssuingAuthorty = #{licenceIssuingAuthorty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, papersValidity = #{papersValidity,jdbcType=DATE}, profession = #{profession,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, educationDegreeID = #{educationDegreeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, educationDegreeName = #{educationDegreeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passengerLevelID = #{passengerLevelID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, papersID = #{papersID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, papersName = #{papersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, papersNumber = #{papersNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitsOrAddress = #{unitsOrAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thingReasonID = #{thingReasonID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thingReasonName = #{thingReasonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, whereAreFrom = #{whereAreFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, whereToGo = #{whereToGo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactPhoneNumber = #{contactPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{del_flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
